name: Fiction
description: Books that contain imaginary or made-up stories.

name: Non-Fiction
description: Books that are based on real facts and information.

name: Science Fiction
description: Books that explore futuristic concepts, science, and technology.

name: Fantasy
description: Books that contain magical or supernatural elements.

name: Mystery
description: Books that involve solving a crime or uncovering secrets.

name: Biography
description: Books that tell the story of a person's life.

name: Self-Help
description: Books that provide guidance on personal development and improvement.

name: History
description: Books that explore past events and historical figures.

name: Romance
description: Books that focus on love and romantic relationships.

name: Horror
description: Books that aim to scare, shock, or unsettle readers.
